item.title: Workshop: Remote Work for Gen Z
item.description:
Today, I attended a workshop on Remote Work for Gen Z at Kedai Dee Aksara from 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM WIB, led by Kak Naufal Fakhri (LinkedIn). The entry fee was Rp 20k.

Overview ðŸŒŸ

Kak Naufal shared his experience working remotely for the past 2 years and why remote work is valuable:

  • Time flexibility: Work when you are most productive
  • Global opportunities: Join international companies requiring digital skills
  • Flexibility: Balance work and life while staying productive

He emphasized that knowing your niche market and building a strong portfolio (CV 2.0) are critical.

item.title: Seminar: Mastersystem
item.description: Today, I attended a Strengthening Cloud Operations with Smart Security and Protection terdapat beberapa vendor/apa menyebutnya, tema? AWS, Fortinet, Infoblox, veeam. Ini onsite di Sheraton Hotel, seharusnya mulai jam 9 AM sampai jam 5 PM, namun karena aku ada kelas dadakan dengan dosen yg killer, aku tidak bisa meminta izin saat itu. Akhirnya aku menghadiri acaranya pada jam 12.30. Karena memang kebanyakan tamu/peserta pada saat itu merupakan manajemen, manajer IT, maupun sepuh lainnya. Yang kuingat pada saat itu, seperti
